thread.section_title: GoDISH Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GoDISH | godish.com
thread.title: GrammaC

author: GrammaC
title: GrammaC
text: The overall experience was good. Friendly, personable reps. But they do rush through the part where they charge you for their "paperwork" and if you don't catch it you may not even realize they're charging you. As soon as I questioned the $50 charge, it was down graded to $25 -- that was weird, but I didn't complain cuz it was better than $50! I'm waiting to see if the gift card offer was legit. I'll be happy if I actually receive it. It would be nice to talk with reps that aren't having to rush through each call cuz there's always another sale on the line. When I got off the phone I kind of felt like I wasn't sure what just happened....
